body.p:
B Perry County Kentucky
Oct 17th 1860
His Excellency Beriah Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky
Sir we the undersigned Citizens of Perry and Breathitt Counties petition your excellency to Pardon Jacob Niece who was Convicted of grand=larceny at the last term of the Perry Circuit Court.

In the first place we understand the evidence against said Niece was weak and in the 2nd he is a very poor man with a family who need his services. He was only Convicted for one year and if your excellency can feel that is Consistent with a sense of Public Justice we do earnestly ask you to Pardon said Niece

Respectfully your petitioners
A B Patrick
J M Elliott
Lewis Campbell
Geo C Haddix
Wm Moore
